title: Ashampoo Burning Studio 16.0.6 + Serial Crack
description:
Burn a wide range of files to disks, generate ISO images, design covers and save unfinished projects whit this reliable application from Ashampoo.



Preswerving your photo's, movie's or music onto optical disc's required a dedicated software that can inscribe the data onto the CD, DVD or BD. One of the most sought after tools on the market today is Ashampoo Burning Studio and it comes packed with everything you will ever need to burn your new disk's.



Familiar and user-friendly GUI

The installation process runs quite seamlessly as no offers for Thirt-Party products are bought forward and no changes are made to your web browsers, thus there are no sneaky toolbars. Upon completion, you are brought to a fairly intuitive and modern interface, as it encloses a menu bar and a navigation panal. Once an option is selected, you come by a pretty typical window.



In addition to that, you should know the interface is quite customizable, allowing users to choose between several skins and multiple color themes.



Burn data, audio tracks and video's, and backup what you deem necessary.



First and formost, Ashampoo Burning Studio enables you to burn data on to disk's faster, by prioviding you with a folder structure and a small wizard to guiode you through the necessary steps. Moreover, it packs disk spanning and encryption capabilities, while it also enables you to update the contents of a selected DVD or CD.



Backing up files and folder is possible, be they from the hard drive or an external storage device. With just a few clicks you can also create audio, MP3 or WMA disc's, movie or slideshow DVD's and Blu-Ray's, video DVD's or BD's from a folder, VCD's and SVCD's.



Create images, erase and rip disc's and save projects

This application also features an audio CD's ripping tool and another one which helps you create covers, cases and booklets and edit the paper format it comes in. It is also possible to create ISO, IMG and CUE images, as well as burn them to disc's and create bootable DVD's, CD's or Blu-Ray's.



Last but not least, you can generate a modified copy of an existing disc, erase a rewritable one or finalize it. Stats can be generated wuith just a click of the button, while you can also save projects, so that you can complete them at a later date.
